meanings.definition: A taxonomic category ranking below an order and above a superfamily.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study different infraorders to understand the relationships between species.
meanings.sent2: The zoologist classified the animals into various infraorders for research purposes.
meanings.sent3: The competition between the infraorders for resources in the ecosystem was fierce.
meanings.sent4: In the intricate web of nature, each infraorder plays a unique role.
meanings.sent5: Learning about infraorders helps us appreciate the diversity of life on Earth.

meanings.sent1: The textbook listed several infraorders of insects found in the region.
meanings.sent2: During the presentation, the speaker mentioned different infraorders of plants.
meanings.sent3: At the zoo, visitors were amazed by the variety of infraorders on display.
meanings.sent4: The garden showcased a beautiful collection of infraorders from around the world.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the different infraorders can be a fascinating journey into the natural world.
